/organization /organization/company 	/location	British Aerospace	For both Thomson and British Aerospace , earnings in their home markets have come under pressure from increasingly tight - fisted defense ministries ; and Middle East sales , a traditional mainstay for both companies ' exports , have been hurt by five years of weak oil prices .
/organization /organization/company 	/location	British Aerospace	In missiles , Thomson is already overshadowed by British Aerospace and by its home rival , France 's Aerospatiale S.A. ; to better compete , Thomson officials say , they need a partnership .

/other /other/art /other/art/writing 	/other	the script " Mongolian handicapped athletes prepare for the Far South Sports Meet " broadcast today	In the script " Mongolian handicapped athletes prepare for the Far South Sports Meet " broadcast today , the " Sports Association Chairman Lahagewasu " at the end of paragraph three should be changed to " Sports Association Chairman Lahagewasulen " .
/other 	/other	September 's steep rise in producer prices	September 's steep rise in producer prices shows that inflation still persists , and the pessimism over interest rates caused by the new price data contributed to the stock market 's plunge Friday .
/other 	/other	The overall 0.9 % increase	`` The overall 0.9 % increase is serious in itself , but what is even worse is that excluding food and energy , the producer price index still increased by 0.7 % , '' said Gordon Richards , an economist at the National Association of Manufacturers .
/other 	/other	the September jump	But Sung Won Sohn , chief economist at Norwest Corp. in Minneapolis , blamed rising energy prices and the annual autumn increase in car prices for most of the September jump .
/other 	/other	the 0.9 % climb	Analysts had expected that the climb in oil prices last month would lead to a substantial rise in the producer price index , but the 0.9 % climb was higher than most anticipated .
/other 	/other	last month 's rise	But Dirk Van Dongen , president of the National Association of Wholesaler - Distributors , said that last month 's rise `` is n't as bad an omen '' as the 0.9 % figure suggests .
/other 	/other	the increase	`` If you examine the data carefully , the increase is concentrated in energy and motor vehicle prices , rather than being a broad - based advance in the prices of consumer and industrial goods , '' he explained .
/other 	/other	the September increase	Many analysts said the September increase was a one - time event , coming as dealers introduced their 1990 models .
/other 	/other	the increase	But at least part of the increase could have come from higher prices , analysts said .
/other 	/other /other/event /other/event/holiday	last month	After falling for three consecutive months , the producer price index for finished goods shot up 0.9 % last month , the Labor Department reported Friday , as energy prices jumped after tumbling through the summer .
/other 	/other	September	Further fueling the belief that pressures in the economy were sufficient to keep the Fed from easing credit , the Commerce Department reported Friday that retail sales grew 0.5 % in September , to $ 145.21 billion .
/other 	/other /other/event /other/event/holiday	last month	Analysts had expected that the climb in oil prices last month would lead to a substantial rise in the producer price index , but the 0.9 % climb was higher than most anticipated .
/other 	/other	last month 's	But Dirk Van Dongen , president of the National Association of Wholesaler - Distributors , said that last month 's rise `` is n't as bad an omen '' as the 0.9 % figure suggests .
/other 	/other /other/event	September	Passenger car prices jumped 3.8 % in September , after climbing 0.5 % in August and declining in the late spring and summer .
/other 	/other	September	Prices for capital equipment rose a hefty 1.1 % in September , while prices for home electronic equipment fell 1.1 % .
/other 	/other /other/event	September	Meanwhile , the retail sales report showed that car sales rose 0.8 % in September to $ 32.82 billion .
/other 	/other /other/event	September	Producer prices for intermediate goods grew 0.4 % in September , after dropping for three consecutive months .
/other 	/other	September	Here are the Labor Department 's producer price indexes ( 1982 = 100 ) for September , before seasonal adjustment , and the percentage changes from September , 1988 .

/organization /organization/government 	/person	the National Foreign Exchange Bureau	In order to perfect the management of international commercial loans , the National Foreign Exchange Bureau decided to implement a new method of managing international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions from January 1st this year .
/organization /organization/government 	/person	the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau	According to regulations by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau , international commercial loans indicate loans raised and borrowed by domestic institutions from financial institutions , enterprises , individual or other economic organizations abroad , and from foreign - funded financial institutions within China 's border , whose contractual repayment obligations are in foreign currency .
/organization /organization/government 	/person	the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .
/organization /organization/government 	/person	the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau	All international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions should be approved by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau .
/organization /organization/government 	/person	the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau	International business loans that have not been approved but were signed on their own authority will not be valid , the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau will not process the registration of foreign debts , banks are not allowed to open exclusive foreign debt accounts for them , loan principals and interests are not to be remitted out on their own authority .
/organization /organization/government 	/person	The National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau	The National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau clearly stipulated in the new method that , domestic institutions borrowing international commercial loans externally are only limited to : China - capital financial institutions approved by the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to operate foreign exchange loan business ; juridical people of non-financial corporations approved by the State Department 's Authorization Department .
/organization /organization/government 	/person	the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau	The National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau clearly stipulated in the new method that , domestic institutions borrowing international commercial loans externally are only limited to : China - capital financial institutions approved by the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to operate foreign exchange loan business ; juridical people of non-financial corporations approved by the State Department 's Authorization Department .
/location /location/country 	/location	China 's	According to regulations by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau , international commercial loans indicate loans raised and borrowed by domestic institutions from financial institutions , enterprises , individual or other economic organizations abroad , and from foreign - funded financial institutions within China 's border , whose contractual repayment obligations are in foreign currency .
/organization /organization/government 	/person	the People 's Bank of China	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .
/organization /organization/company /organization/government 	/person	the People 's Bank of China	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .
/other 	/other	International business loans	International business loans that have not been approved but were signed on their own authority will not be valid , the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau will not process the registration of foreign debts , banks are not allowed to open exclusive foreign debt accounts for them , loan principals and interests are not to be remitted out on their own authority .
/other 	/location	foreign debts	International business loans that have not been approved but were signed on their own authority will not be valid , the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau will not process the registration of foreign debts , banks are not allowed to open exclusive foreign debt accounts for them , loan principals and interests are not to be remitted out on their own authority .
/organization /organization/company 	/location	banks	International business loans that have not been approved but were signed on their own authority will not be valid , the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau will not process the registration of foreign debts , banks are not allowed to open exclusive foreign debt accounts for them , loan principals and interests are not to be remitted out on their own authority .
/organization /organization/company 	/location	domestic institutions	The National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau clearly stipulated in the new method that , domestic institutions borrowing international commercial loans externally are only limited to : China - capital financial institutions approved by the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to operate foreign exchange loan business ; juridical people of non-financial corporations approved by the State Department 's Authorization Department .
/other 	/other	commercial loans	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .
/other 	/other	total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
/other 	/other /person	50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .

/organization /organization/company /organization/government 	/other	the People 's Bank	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .
/other 	/person	project financing	Export credits , international financing leaseholds , compensation trades with foreign exchange repayment methods , overseas institution 's and individual 's foreign exchange deposits ( excluding foreign exchange deposits in banks approved for offshore operations ) , project financing , financing under trade projects over 90 days and other forms of foreign exchange loans will all be treated and managed as international commercial loans .

/person /person/legal 	/person	juridical people of non-financial corporations approved by the State Department 's Authorization Department	The National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau clearly stipulated in the new method that , domestic institutions borrowing international commercial loans externally are only limited to : China - capital financial institutions approved by the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to operate foreign exchange loan business ; juridical people of non-financial corporations approved by the State Department 's Authorization Department .
/other 	/person	the registration	International business loans that have not been approved but were signed on their own authority will not be valid , the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau will not process the registration of foreign debts , banks are not allowed to open exclusive foreign debt accounts for them , loan principals and interests are not to be remitted out on their own authority .

/organization /organization/company 	/other	individual or other economic organizations	According to regulations by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau , international commercial loans indicate loans raised and borrowed by domestic institutions from financial institutions , enterprises , individual or other economic organizations abroad , and from foreign - funded financial institutions within China 's border , whose contractual repayment obligations are in foreign currency .
/other 	/other	total assets	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
/other /other/currency 	/location/country	foreign currency	According to regulations by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau , international commercial loans indicate loans raised and borrowed by domestic institutions from financial institutions , enterprises , individual or other economic organizations abroad , and from foreign - funded financial institutions within China 's border , whose contractual repayment obligations are in foreign currency .
/other 	/other	a ratio	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
/other 	/other	a ratio of net assets to total assets	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
/other 	/person	exclusive foreign debt accounts	International business loans that have not been approved but were signed on their own authority will not be valid , the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau will not process the registration of foreign debts , banks are not allowed to open exclusive foreign debt accounts for them , loan principals and interests are not to be remitted out on their own authority .
/organization /organization/company 	/person /person/title	enterprises	According to regulations by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau , international commercial loans indicate loans raised and borrowed by domestic institutions from financial institutions , enterprises , individual or other economic organizations abroad , and from foreign - funded financial institutions within China 's border , whose contractual repayment obligations are in foreign currency .
/other 	/other	a new method of managing international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions from January 1st this year	In order to perfect the management of international commercial loans , the National Foreign Exchange Bureau decided to implement a new method of managing international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions from January 1st this year .
/location /location/city 	/location /location/city	Beijing	Xinhua News Agency , Beijing , January 3rd
/person /person/legal 	/other	juridical people	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
/other 	/person	the approval , supervision and management	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .
/other 	/other	15 %	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
/other 	/person	a new method	In order to perfect the management of international commercial loans , the National Foreign Exchange Bureau decided to implement a new method of managing international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions from January 1st this year .
/other 	/person	All international commercial loans	All international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions should be approved by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau .
/other 	/other	financing under trade projects over 90 days	Export credits , international financing leaseholds , compensation trades with foreign exchange repayment methods , overseas institution 's and individual 's foreign exchange deposits ( excluding foreign exchange deposits in banks approved for offshore operations ) , project financing , financing under trade projects over 90 days and other forms of foreign exchange loans will all be treated and managed as international commercial loans .
/other 	/other	the last three years	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .

/other 	/other	foreign exchange loans	Export credits , international financing leaseholds , compensation trades with foreign exchange repayment methods , overseas institution 's and individual 's foreign exchange deposits ( excluding foreign exchange deposits in banks approved for offshore operations ) , project financing , financing under trade projects over 90 days and other forms of foreign exchange loans will all be treated and managed as international commercial loans .
/other 	/person	their own authority	International business loans that have not been approved but were signed on their own authority will not be valid , the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau will not process the registration of foreign debts , banks are not allowed to open exclusive foreign debt accounts for them , loan principals and interests are not to be remitted out on their own authority .
/other 	/other	international commercial loans	The National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau clearly stipulated in the new method that , domestic institutions borrowing international commercial loans externally are only limited to : China - capital financial institutions approved by the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to operate foreign exchange loan business ; juridical people of non-financial corporations approved by the State Department 's Authorization Department .
/organization /organization/government 	/person	the approving authority	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .

/organization /organization/company 	/person	non-financial corporations approved by the State Department 's Authorization Department	The National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau clearly stipulated in the new method that , domestic institutions borrowing international commercial loans externally are only limited to : China - capital financial institutions approved by the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to operate foreign exchange loan business ; juridical people of non-financial corporations approved by the State Department 's Authorization Department .
/other 	/other	the registration of foreign debts	International business loans that have not been approved but were signed on their own authority will not be valid , the Foreign Exchange Management Bureau will not process the registration of foreign debts , banks are not allowed to open exclusive foreign debt accounts for them , loan principals and interests are not to be remitted out on their own authority .

/organization /organization/company 	/person/title	financial institutions	According to regulations by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau , international commercial loans indicate loans raised and borrowed by domestic institutions from financial institutions , enterprises , individual or other economic organizations abroad , and from foreign - funded financial institutions within China 's border , whose contractual repayment obligations are in foreign currency .
/organization /organization/company 	/other	non trade - type non-financial corporations	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
/organization /organization/company 	/location	domestic institutions	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .
/organization /organization/company 	/person	overseas institution 's	Export credits , international financing leaseholds , compensation trades with foreign exchange repayment methods , overseas institution 's and individual 's foreign exchange deposits ( excluding foreign exchange deposits in banks approved for offshore operations ) , project financing , financing under trade projects over 90 days and other forms of foreign exchange loans will all be treated and managed as international commercial loans .
/organization /organization/company 	/location	foreign - funded financial institutions within China 's border	According to regulations by the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau , international commercial loans indicate loans raised and borrowed by domestic institutions from financial institutions , enterprises , individual or other economic organizations abroad , and from foreign - funded financial institutions within China 's border , whose contractual repayment obligations are in foreign currency .
/organization /organization/company 	/location	domestic institutions	According to regulations , the People 's Bank of China is the approving authority for international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions , the People 's Bank of China has authorized the National Foreign Exchange Management Bureau to be specifically responsible for the approval , supervision and management of commercial loans by domestic institutions .
/other 	/other	total assets	Juridical people of non-financial institutions who borrow international commercial loans directly must possess these several conditions , that is , have continual profits for the last three years , have import and export business permission , belong to a national encouraged industry ; possess a complete financial management system ; must have a ratio of net assets to total assets not lower than 15 % for juridical people of trade - type non-financial corporations , must have ratios of net assets to total assets not lower than 30 % for juridical people of non trade - type non-financial corporations ; must have a total sum of international business loans borrowed and foreign guarantee surpluses not exceeding 50 % of net asset 's equivalent foreign exchange worth ; must have total of foreign exchange loan and foreign exchange guarantee surplus not exceeding the amount of exchange created in the previous year .
/other 	/location	international commercial loans	In order to perfect the management of international commercial loans , the National Foreign Exchange Bureau decided to implement a new method of managing international commercial loans borrowed by domestic institutions from January 1st this year .
/person /person/artist /person/artist/author 	/person	reporter Baixin Zhang	Xinhua News Agency , Jinan , September 2nd , by reporter Baixin Zhang
/person /person/artist /person/artist/author 	/person	this reporter	A government official of Shandong Province told this reporter that this province established agricultural new high level technology development and model zones beginning in 1992 , whose main purpose is to accelerate the transformation of agricultural new high level technology achievements through introducing agricultural new high level technologies from home and abroad to carry out development in order to provide effective models for agricultural production and rural economy development to promote the transformation of traditional agriculture into modern agriculture .
/location /location/city 	/location	Laiwu City of Shandong Province	Laiwu City of Shandong Province has established a cell structure cultivation center inside the agricultural new high level technology development and model zones , to introduce and tame improved breeds of nurseries , flowers and vegetables from home and abroad .
/location /location/city 	/location /location/city	Laiwu City	According to understanding , currently Shandong has established ten agricultural new high level technology development and model zones similar to that of Laiwu City .
/location /location/city 	/location /location/city	Laiwu City	Laiwu City has established a detoxification production base to carry out nursery detoxification on traditional products such as shallot , ginger and garlic , and after detoxification , the output of shallot , ginger and garlic has increased more than doubled .
/location 	/location	Shandong Province	Laiwu City of Shandong Province has established a cell structure cultivation center inside the agricultural new high level technology development and model zones , to introduce and tame improved breeds of nurseries , flowers and vegetables from home and abroad .

/other /other/legal 	/other	the Fifth	Unfortunately , by my rough guess , he used better than 5,000 words heaping scorn on the witnesses for exercising the Fifth .
/other /other/legal 	/other	the Fifth Amendment	As your editorial rightly pointed out , Samuel Pierce , former HUD secretary , and Lance Wilson , Mr. Pierce 's former aide , `` are currently being held up to scorn for taking the Fifth Amendment .
/other /other/legal 	/person	The Fifth Amendment	The Fifth Amendment states in relevant part that no person `` shall be compelled , in any criminal case , to be a witness against himself . ''
/other /other/legal 	/other	the Fifth	Thus , in a criminal case , a prosecutor can not comment on a defendant 's failure to testify nor can the defendant be compelled to take the stand as a witness , thus forcing him to `` take the Fifth . ''
/other /other/legal 	/organization	the Fifth Amendment	The Supreme Court and some states have specifically recognized that `` the Fifth Amendment does not preclude the inference where the privilege is claimed by a party to a civil cause . ''
/other /other/legal 	/person	the Fifth	Thus , in a civil case , a defendant may be called as a witness , he may be forced to testify or take the Fifth , and his taking of the Fifth may permit the drawing of an adverse inference against him in the civil matter .
/other /other/legal 	/person	the Fifth	Thus , in a civil case , a defendant may be called as a witness , he may be forced to testify or take the Fifth , and his taking of the Fifth may permit the drawing of an adverse inference against him in the civil matter .
/other /other/legal 	/person	the Fifth	He may take the Fifth in a civil matter only if he has a good faith and justifiable belief that his testimony may subject him to criminal prosecution .
/other /other/legal 	/person	the Fifth	Allowing the defendant to take the Fifth in a civil matter is not based on a constitutional right to refuse to testify where one 's testimony harms him in the civil matter , but because the testimony in the civil matter could be unconstitutionally used against him in a subsequent criminal prosecution .
/other /other/legal 	/person	the Fifth	Thus , when Mr. Pierce asserted the Fifth in a noncriminal proceeding , particularly after presumably receiving extensive advice from legal counsel , one must conclude that he held a good - faith , justifiable belief that his testimony could be used against him in a subsequent criminal prosecution .

/location /location/city 	/location /location/city	Beijing	Barre and his entourage arrived in Beijing on the 30th at the invitation of the Foreign Affairs Institute .
/person /person/political_figure 	/person	vice premier of the State Council and Foreign Affairs Minister Qichen Qian	This afternoon , vice premier of the State Council and Foreign Affairs Minister Qichen Qian met here individually with former French Prime Minister Raymond Barre and vice Foreign Affairs Minister of Paraguay East Coast Republic Hershy Maria Carmel .
/person /person/political_figure 	/person	Qichen Qian	Qichen Qian told the French guest that France is the first big western country to establish diplomatic relations with China , and that over the past 30 years since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and France , the development of bilateral relations has been satisfactory overall despite some complications .

/person /person/political_figure 	/person	Qichen Qian	Qichen Qian expressed his gratitude towards the support Uruguay has given to China in international affairs , and expressed commendation over Uruguay government 's position of persisting in their one - China stance .
/person /person/political_figure 	/person	former French Prime Minister Raymond Barre	This afternoon , vice premier of the State Council and Foreign Affairs Minister Qichen Qian met here individually with former French Prime Minister Raymond Barre and vice Foreign Affairs Minister of Paraguay East Coast Republic Hershy Maria Carmel .
/person /person/political_figure 	/person	the French guest	Qichen Qian told the French guest that France is the first big western country to establish diplomatic relations with China , and that over the past 30 years since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and France , the development of bilateral relations has been satisfactory overall despite some complications .
/person /person/political_figure 	/person	Barre	Barre hoped that Franco - Chinese relations would achieve further development and strengthening , and also expressed that France , using its dominant position , was willing to more actively participate in the economic build - up of China .
/person /person/political_figure 	/person	Barre	Barre and his entourage arrived in Beijing on the 30th at the invitation of the Foreign Affairs Institute .

/location /location/city 	/location	Beijing 's	The Wangma Computer Company , a high science and technology enterprise in Beijing 's Zhongguan village , held a press conference in the Great Hall Of the People on January 4th and announced : to meet urgent demands for office automation of all Party departments , the government and the army , it was decided to " open " a whole set of top - quality products of Wangma Software , which can profit more than one million yuan , to the home , all in the way to non-encoded floppy disks , exempting technical fees , so that all domestic computer users can copy and use .

/organization /organization/company 	/person	The Wangma Computer Company	The Wangma Computer Company was named for the Wubi font , the coding method of Chinese characters invented by the famous computer expert - Yongmin Wang .
/organization /organization/company 	/person	the Wangma Computer Company	In order to benefit society , the Wangma Computer Company determinedly gave up an opportunity that would have earned big money by dedicating unencoded floppy disks to users , allowing them to copy by themselves .

/location /location/city 	/location /location/city /organization/company	Guangzhou	Xinhua News Agency , Guangzhou , April 23rd , by reporter correspondent Shengmin Zhao
/location /location/city 	/location	Guangzhou 's	Guangzhou 's private sector economy is developing swiftly , enterprise scale is gradually enlarging , and has begun to develop towards the area of high and new technology industries .
/location /location/city 	/location /location/city	Guangzhou	According to statistics , by the first quarter of this year , the number of registered private enterprises in Guangzhou has reached 7646 .
/location /location/city 	/location	Guangzhou 's	In the first quarter of this year , the development of Guangzhou 's privately owned enterprises again showed many characteristics : all walks of life are developing extensively , and the development of industry and commerce is remarkable .
/location /location/city 	/other	the whole city	The proportion of the number of private industries and private commerce in the total number of private enterprises and employed people of the whole city is respectively 76.33 % and 78.32 % , the number of recently opened private enterprises are continually increasing .
/location /location/city 	/other	the whole city	The first quarter this year , totally , registered and recently started privately owned enterprises of the whole city are 851 , 5.98 % higher than that of the same period of the previous year .
/location /location/city 	/location	Guangzhou 's	By the end of the first quarter of this year , the registered capital of Guangzhou 's privately owned enterprises is 3.08 billion yuan , 24.97 % higher than that of the end of last year .
/location /location/city 	/location	Guangzhou 's	Guangzhou 's private enterprises have begun to set foot in the area of high and new technology industries , and the rate of development is considerably fast .
/location /location/city 	/location /location/city	Guangzhou	In the first quarter of this year , the number of science and technology consulting enterprises in Guangzhou has reached 534 , more than double of that of the same period of the previous year .
/location /location/city 	/location	Guangzhou 's	In the first quarter of this year , Guangzhou 's private industries , construction industries and traffic and transportation industries have achieved a total output value of 412 million yuan , 22.62 % higher than that of the same period of the previous year .

/other 	/other /other/event /other/event/holiday	last year	The statistics from the General Administration of Customs show that , last year , China 's trade with Japan continued increasing , the gross value of imports and exports reached 60.06 billion US dollars , 4.5 % higher than that of last year , and accounted for 20.7 % of China 's gross value of foreign trade .
/other 	/other /other/event /other/event/holiday	last year	Japan has , for four years , successively ranked first place among China 's foreign trade partners , and the bilateral trade volume last year was 17.22 billion US dollars higher than that of China and the US , China 's second largest trade partner .
/other 	/other	Last year	Last year , exports of primary products to Japan were 8 billion US dollars , 10.9 % higher than that of the previous year , and imports of primary products from Japan were 1 billion US dollars , a 4.4 % growth .
/other 	/other	Last year	Last year , the exports of foreign - invested enterprises to Japan were 14.9 billion US dollars , up 35.4 % , and accounted for 48 % of China 's exports to Japan ; imports were 19.5 billion US dollars , up 14.7 % , and accounted for 67 % of China 's total import value from Japan .

/location /location/country 	/location /location/country	China	Japan has , for four years , successively ranked first place among China 's foreign trade partners , and the bilateral trade volume last year was 17.22 billion US dollars higher than that of China and the US , China 's second largest trade partner .
/location /location/country 	/location	China 's	Japan has , for four years , successively ranked first place among China 's foreign trade partners , and the bilateral trade volume last year was 17.22 billion US dollars higher than that of China and the US , China 's second largest trade partner .
/location /location/country 	/location	China 's	According to presentations , the dependency of China 's exported products on the Japanese market has been increasing annually , but the proportion of imported products in the total import volume from Japan has fluctuated irregularly ; the development of various trade methods was not balanced , general trade has decreased , processing trade has increased ; while the growth of primary product trade was considerably fast .
/location /location/country 	/location	China 's	Last year , the exports of foreign - invested enterprises to Japan were 14.9 billion US dollars , up 35.4 % , and accounted for 48 % of China 's exports to Japan ; imports were 19.5 billion US dollars , up 14.7 % , and accounted for 67 % of China 's total import value from Japan .

/organization /organization/company 	/other	Interprovincial , Canada 's biggest oil pipeline operator and a major transporter of crude to the U.S. ,	Interprovincial , Canada 's biggest oil pipeline operator and a major transporter of crude to the U.S. , said revised industry forecasts indicate that Canadian oil output will total about 1.64 million barrels a day by 1991 , 8 % lower than a previous estimate .
/organization /organization/company 	/person	Interprovincial 's	`` The capability of existing fields to deliver oil is dropping , '' and oil exploration activity is also down dramatically , as many producers shift their emphasis to natural gas , said Ronald Watkins , vice president for government and industry relations with Interprovincial 's parent , Interhome Energy Inc .
/organization /organization/company 	/person	Interprovincial 's	Mr. Watkins said volume on Interprovincial 's system is down about 2 % since January and is expected to fall further , making expansion unnecessary until perhaps the mid-1990s .
/organization /organization/company 	/location	Interprovincial	Interprovincial transports about 75 % of all crude produced in western Canada , and almost 60 % of Interprovincial 's total volume consists of light crude .
/organization /organization/company 	/person	Interprovincial 's	Interprovincial transports about 75 % of all crude produced in western Canada , and almost 60 % of Interprovincial 's total volume consists of light crude .
/organization /organization/company 	/person	Interprovincial 's	Nearly all of the crude oil that Canada exports to the U.S. is transported on Interprovincial 's system , whose main line runs from Edmonton to major U.S. and Canadian cities in the Great Lakes region , including Chicago , Buffalo , Toronto and Montreal .

/person /person/legal 	/person	Justice Brennan	In the seven Supreme Court terms from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1967 , the height of the Warren Court 's power , Justice Brennan cast only 25 dissenting votes in 555 cases decided by the court .

/location /organization 	/location	the Tianjin Port Bonded Area	According to statistics , last year , the Tianjin Port Bonded Area completed a total amount of 850 million US dollars in investment agreements , increasing by 72 % over the same period of the previous year , with total foreign investment agreements of 700 million US dollars , increasing by 75 % over the same period of the previous year .
/location /organization 	/other	the area	It achieved a total volume of 4 billion US dollars of goods going into and out of the area , increasing by 83 % over the same period of the previous year , with a total amount of 1 billion US dollars from imports and exports .
/location /organization 	/location	the Tianjin Port Bonded Area	Since being put into operation five years ago , the Tianjin Port Bonded Area has completed the construction of China 's first goods distribution center , functions like a customs port , opened up the special use the railway line from the Tianjin Port Bonded Area passing Xi'an and Lanzhou to arrive at Xinjiang 's Allah Mountain pass customs port , established a number of large - scale materials circulation distribution and supply centers integrating storage , transportation and sales , opened multiple railway and international container joint - operations with a monthly loading and unloading capacity reaching 6,000 standard containers .

/location /organization 	/person	the bonded area	Moreover , the bonded area has implemented a series of preferential policies towards enterprises entering the area : it has established a system of " no custom accounting " and established manuals and management ; for enterprises engaged in international trade and storage processing in the area , the equipment and materials needed are duty free , and domestic trade continuing to sell out of the bonded area is regarded as export , for which customs provides tax refunds , etc .

/other 	/other	a total volume	It achieved a total volume of 4 billion US dollars of goods going into and out of the area , increasing by 83 % over the same period of the previous year , with a total amount of 1 billion US dollars from imports and exports .

/other 	/other	total foreign investment agreements	According to statistics , last year , the Tianjin Port Bonded Area completed a total amount of 850 million US dollars in investment agreements , increasing by 72 % over the same period of the previous year , with total foreign investment agreements of 700 million US dollars , increasing by 75 % over the same period of the previous year .

/other 	/other	domestic trade	Moreover , the bonded area has implemented a series of preferential policies towards enterprises entering the area : it has established a system of " no custom accounting " and established manuals and management ; for enterprises engaged in international trade and storage processing in the area , the equipment and materials needed are duty free , and domestic trade continuing to sell out of the bonded area is regarded as export , for which customs provides tax refunds , etc .

/other 	/other	the past five years	According to statistics , in the past five years , Tianjin Bonded Area has attracted a total of over 3000 enterprises from 73 countries and regions all over the world and 25 domestic provinces , cities and municipalities to invest , reaching a total agreed investment value of more than 3 billion US dollars and a total agreed foreign investment reaching more than 2 billion US dollars .
/other /other/product 	/person	program - controlled telephones	It has built up an installation capacity of 7,000 sets of program - controlled telephones , had a power supply capacity of 25,000 kilovolts , and a daily water supply capacity of 10,000 tons .

/other 	/person /person/title	manuals and management	Moreover , the bonded area has implemented a series of preferential policies towards enterprises entering the area : it has established a system of " no custom accounting " and established manuals and management ; for enterprises engaged in international trade and storage processing in the area , the equipment and materials needed are duty free , and domestic trade continuing to sell out of the bonded area is regarded as export , for which customs provides tax refunds , etc .

/person /person/legal 	/person	The thrifts ' lawyers	The thrifts ' lawyers claim that the suits , numbering 700 to 1,000 in Texas alone , should be dismissed as moot because neither the S&Ls nor the extinct Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corp. has the money to pay judgments .
/person /person/legal 	/person	even the S&L lawyers	Though the argument may have a common - sense ring to it , even the S&L lawyers concede there 's little precedent to back their position .

/organization /organization/company 	/person	the company	Gulf Resources & Chemical Corp. said it agreed to pay $ 1.5 million as part of an accord with the Environmental Protection Agency regarding an environmental cleanup of a defunct smelter the company formerly operated in Idaho .
/organization /organization/company 	/other	Gulf Resources , which was a part - owner of the smelter	In 1984 the EPA notified Gulf Resources , which was a part - owner of the smelter , that it was potentially liable for sharing cleanup costs at the site under the federal Superfund program .
/organization /organization/company 	/location	Gulf Resources	Gulf Resources earlier this year proposed a reorganization plan that would make it a unit of a Bermuda concern , potentially exempting it from liability for the smelter 's cleanup costs .

/other 	/person	the help	In 1995 and 1996 , with the help of the United Nations Development and Planning Office and the Industrial Development Organization , China and North Korea successively held the " Tumen River region investment and trade negotiation conference " , and both made relatively good achievements .
/other 	/location	China 's Changbai Mountain 's ice and snow winter tourism , etc.	This year , the United Nations Development and Planning Office held a Tumen River Area International Tourism Conference in Jilin , China , actively supporting projects such as China 's Changbai Mountain 's ice and snow winter tourism , etc. , while at the same time , still providing funds for training international economic and trade talent here .

/other 	/person	the current state of industrial projects in the Tumen River region	The United Nations Industrial Development Organization recently implemented a thorough investigation into the current state of industrial projects in the Tumen River region , and made some suggestions about future industrial development projects in this area .

/other 	/other	strong support	The Tumen River Development Program has also received strong support from governments and enterprises of many countries .

/location /location/city 	/location /location/city	Guangzhou	Xinhua News Agency , Guangzhou , September 1st , by reporter Wei Zhao
/location /location/city 	/location /location/city	Guangzhou	Fourteen cities such as Guangzhou , Shenzhen , etc. went to Beijing for the first national talent and technology exchange fair , where they established a total of 100 employment booths .
/location 	/location	Guangdong Province	In the past two years , Guangdong Province has exerted itself to explore new ways of attracting talent under market economy conditions , and has been active in using market mechanisms to allocate resources of talent , and has achieved preliminary results .
/location 	/location	Guangdong 's	" Taking the first step " in Guangdong 's reform and opening up in the 1980's was closely related to the situation at that time of the " Peafowl Flying Towards the Southeast " ( human talents from all over , one after another , going to Guangdong ) .
/location 	/location	Guangdong	" Taking the first step " in Guangdong 's reform and opening up in the 1980's was closely related to the situation at that time of the " Peafowl Flying Towards the Southeast " ( human talents from all over , one after another , going to Guangdong ) .
/location 	/location	Guangdong 's	Further enhancing the attraction to talented persons has become the key point of Guangdong 's further development .
/location 	/location	Guangdong Province	Limo Qin , director of the Talent Exchange and Service Center of Guangdong Province has done analysis and said : " the economic development rate of Guangdong in 1993 was at an intermediate level of that in the recent years .
/location 	/location	Guangdong	Limo Qin , director of the Talent Exchange and Service Center of Guangdong Province has done analysis and said : " the economic development rate of Guangdong in 1993 was at an intermediate level of that in the recent years .
/location 	/location	Guangdong 's	Developing at this rate , in the next ten years , not including graduates from higher education institutes , Guangdong 's talent gap is conservatively estimated to surpass 1 million .
/location 	/person	Guangdong 's	Therefore , further opening minds and introducing talent are guidelines of Guangdong 's policy regarding talented people . "
/location 	/location	Guangdong 's	In recent years , there have been more and more climaxes in Guangdong 's talent market .
/location 	/location	the province	In the whole year of 1993 , talent exchange centers of personnel departments across the province registered more than 463,000 people applying for jobs .
/location 	/location	the province	Since 1991 when Shenzhen established the first standing talent market , such " all - weather " talent exchange organizations have rapidly spread in the Zhujiang Delta and all cities within the province .
/location 	/location	the province	Now , there are fifteen cities with relatively more advanced economies in the province having built up regular markets .
/location 	/location	Guangdong Province	In order to further enhance the attraction of talent , to break through the barrier of " departmental ownership " of talent , and to promote the flow of talent by forming mechanisms of independent employment and job choice , Guangdong Province has also paid greater attention to the formulation of relevant policies and regulations .
/location 	/location	Guangdong	Limo Qin said in his introduction that in recent years the provincial government has successively issued documents such as " Temporary regulations on encouraging persons studying abroad to work in Guangdong " , " Notices on better advertising for talent " , etc .
/location 	/location	Guangdong Province	It will soon promulgate documents such as " Detailed rules for implementing temporary regulations on resignations of specialists , technicians and managers in state - owned units " and " Supplementary regulations of Guangdong Province on the management of Chinese side cadres in foreign investment enterprises " , etc .
/location /location/country 	/location	China 's	With the overall opening up of China 's coastal areas , frontier areas , riverside areas and capital cities of every province since the 1990's , the flow of talent tends to be multi-directional and the competition has become increasingly fierce .
/location /location/country 	/location /location/country	China	1006 students abroad filled out application forms , and quite a number of people have successively returned to China to take jobs .

/location 	/location	Gansu Province 's	To ensure that the opening up to the outside world can be implemented smoothly , during the " eighth five - year plan " period ( 1991 to 1995 ) , Gansu Province 's foreign affairs insurance industry developed rapidly , and it has already provided an accumulated sum of 61.1 billion yuan in terms of risk safeguard .
/location 	/location	Gansu Province	According to presentations from concerned departments in Gansu Province , since the " eighth five - year plan " , Gansu Province has used foreign investments to vigorously develop .
/location 	/location	Gansu Province	According to presentations from concerned departments in Gansu Province , since the " eighth five - year plan " , Gansu Province has used foreign investments to vigorously develop .
/location 	/location	Gansu Province	According to statistics , during the " eighth five - year plan " period , the amount of risk People 's Insurance Co. took up for the import and export trade of Gansu Province reached 771 million yuan , and paid out 13.855 million yuan as indemnity , effectively promoting the development of Gansu Province 's import and export trade .
/location 	/location	Gansu Province 's	According to statistics , during the " eighth five - year plan " period , the amount of risk People 's Insurance Co. took up for the import and export trade of Gansu Province reached 771 million yuan , and paid out 13.855 million yuan as indemnity , effectively promoting the development of Gansu Province 's import and export trade .
/location 	/location	Gansu Province	People 's Insurance Co. in Gansu Province provided all kinds of risk insurance to thirteen of the joint venture contractors and had indemnity reaching 693 million yuan .
/location 	/location	Gansu Province	Aiming at the development requirements of the Gansu tourism industry , People 's Insurance Co. actively promotes travel insurance for overseas tourists , and took the lead at home in providing insurance for individual overseas tourists , which made sure that all those who came sightseeing in Gansu Province during the " eighth five - year plan " period had insurance .
/location 	/location	Gansu Province	Gansu Province also actively explored high risk business .
/location 	/location	the province	At the same time , it actively expanded its insurance business in the overseas market , providing nearly 30 million US dollars in comprehensive insurance for construction engineering to the Zimbabwe Highway project that was bid on by an international company in the province ; providing liability insurance of 13 million US dollars for the overseas department of the Lanzhou Petrochemical Machinery Factory and the Singapore Oil Drilling Platform ; providing related forms of insurance for Gansu Province 's Overseas Economic and Trade Negotiation Association and for laborers exported overseas ; and also providing complementary insurance services for the overseas business of the Gansu Province Thermoelectric Company .

/organization /organization/company 	/person	the Zhengda Company	Conventional insurance lines such as transportation insurance , property insurance , automobile insurance , etc. are specially offered to foreign funded enterprises such as the Zhengda Company and the Huaxing Aluminum Firm , etc. and new types of insurance such as employer liability insurance , investment insurance , and profit - loss insurance , etc. are also offered at the appropriate time , satisfying the investment needs of foreign businessmen , bringing the insurance rate of the foreign business invested enterprises to more than 90 percent .

/organization /organization/government 	/location	Customs	The main Bureau of Customs recently issued an announcement that Customs would implement protective measures for intellectual property rights at border entry and exit junctions starting on September 15th , 1994 in accordance with currently implemented related laws and the " decision regarding the further strengthening of work protecting intellectual property rights " by the State Council .
/organization /organization/government 	/location /person	Customs	The main Bureau of Customs recently issued an announcement that Customs would implement protective measures for intellectual property rights at border entry and exit junctions starting on September 15th , 1994 in accordance with currently implemented related laws and the " decision regarding the further strengthening of work protecting intellectual property rights " by the State Council .
/organization /organization/government 	/location	Customs	The announcement clearly pointed out that goods violating intellectual property rights , including exclusive rights of trademarks , copyrights and patent rights , were not allowed to be imported or exported ; when Customs discovers the import and export of goods that are reported as violating rights and other goods that were suspected of violating intellectual property rights , it has the right to ask the people importing and exporting the goods to provide legal proof of use of related intellectual property rights and make additional reports to Customs about the state of the intellectual property rights of goods .
/organization /organization/government 	/location /person	Customs	The announcement clearly pointed out that goods violating intellectual property rights , including exclusive rights of trademarks , copyrights and patent rights , were not allowed to be imported or exported ; when Customs discovers the import and export of goods that are reported as violating rights and other goods that were suspected of violating intellectual property rights , it has the right to ask the people importing and exporting the goods to provide legal proof of use of related intellectual property rights and make additional reports to Customs about the state of the intellectual property rights of goods .
/organization /organization/government 	/location /person	Customs	Customs is entitled to reject shipments of goods that can not provide legal proof ; for importing and exporting laser discs , laser video discs and importing laser disc molds and materials and laser videos as part of processing trade , the consignors and consignees shall complete Customs formalities based on relevant regulations of the country and proof of approval issued by relevant departments concerned with audio and video products ; when importing and exporting goods , if the consignors and consignees falsify conditions of the property rights of the goods , evade supervision of Customs , and smuggle goods that violate rights , Customs will handle them in accordance with the relevant regulations .

/organization /organization/government 	/location	Customs	Based on rights certificates of the intellectual property rights ( for example certificates of registration of intellectual property rights or samples of the works that are copyrighted and related materials sufficient to prove their rights ) , they can report to Custom locations where the relevant goods are imported or exported and also request Customs to investigate and deal with the import and export of goods that violate .
/organization /organization/government 	/location /person	Customs	Owners of intellectual property rights , when requesting Customs to investigate and deal with goods that violate rights , should bear responsibility for reporting , assist Customs to develop investigation work and pay the appraisal and investigation of the related goods and other related expenses .

/other /other/legal 	/location	intellectual property rights	The main Bureau of Customs recently issued an announcement that Customs would implement protective measures for intellectual property rights at border entry and exit junctions starting on September 15th , 1994 in accordance with currently implemented related laws and the " decision regarding the further strengthening of work protecting intellectual property rights " by the State Council .
/other 	/other	conditions of the property rights of the goods	Customs is entitled to reject shipments of goods that can not provide legal proof ; for importing and exporting laser discs , laser video discs and importing laser disc molds and materials and laser videos as part of processing trade , the consignors and consignees shall complete Customs formalities based on relevant regulations of the country and proof of approval issued by relevant departments concerned with audio and video products ; when importing and exporting goods , if the consignors and consignees falsify conditions of the property rights of the goods , evade supervision of Customs , and smuggle goods that violate rights , Customs will handle them in accordance with the relevant regulations .
/other 	/other	use	The announcement clearly pointed out that goods violating intellectual property rights , including exclusive rights of trademarks , copyrights and patent rights , were not allowed to be imported or exported ; when Customs discovers the import and export of goods that are reported as violating rights and other goods that were suspected of violating intellectual property rights , it has the right to ask the people importing and exporting the goods to provide legal proof of use of related intellectual property rights and make additional reports to Customs about the state of the intellectual property rights of goods .
/other /other/legal 	/other	intellectual property rights , including exclusive rights of trademarks , copyrights and patent rights	The announcement clearly pointed out that goods violating intellectual property rights , including exclusive rights of trademarks , copyrights and patent rights , were not allowed to be imported or exported ; when Customs discovers the import and export of goods that are reported as violating rights and other goods that were suspected of violating intellectual property rights , it has the right to ask the people importing and exporting the goods to provide legal proof of use of related intellectual property rights and make additional reports to Customs about the state of the intellectual property rights of goods .
/other 	/person /person/title	responsibility for reporting	Owners of intellectual property rights , when requesting Customs to investigate and deal with goods that violate rights , should bear responsibility for reporting , assist Customs to develop investigation work and pay the appraisal and investigation of the related goods and other related expenses .
/other /other/legal 	/other	samples of the works that are copyrighted and related materials sufficient to prove their rights	Based on rights certificates of the intellectual property rights ( for example certificates of registration of intellectual property rights or samples of the works that are copyrighted and related materials sufficient to prove their rights ) , they can report to Custom locations where the relevant goods are imported or exported and also request Customs to investigate and deal with the import and export of goods that violate .
/other /other/product 	/person /other	audio and video products	Customs is entitled to reject shipments of goods that can not provide legal proof ; for importing and exporting laser discs , laser video discs and importing laser disc molds and materials and laser videos as part of processing trade , the consignors and consignees shall complete Customs formalities based on relevant regulations of the country and proof of approval issued by relevant departments concerned with audio and video products ; when importing and exporting goods , if the consignors and consignees falsify conditions of the property rights of the goods , evade supervision of Customs , and smuggle goods that violate rights , Customs will handle them in accordance with the relevant regulations .
/other 	/person	use of related intellectual property rights	The announcement clearly pointed out that goods violating intellectual property rights , including exclusive rights of trademarks , copyrights and patent rights , were not allowed to be imported or exported ; when Customs discovers the import and export of goods that are reported as violating rights and other goods that were suspected of violating intellectual property rights , it has the right to ask the people importing and exporting the goods to provide legal proof of use of related intellectual property rights and make additional reports to Customs about the state of the intellectual property rights of goods .
/other /other/legal 	/other	the property rights of the goods	Customs is entitled to reject shipments of goods that can not provide legal proof ; for importing and exporting laser discs , laser video discs and importing laser disc molds and materials and laser videos as part of processing trade , the consignors and consignees shall complete Customs formalities based on relevant regulations of the country and proof of approval issued by relevant departments concerned with audio and video products ; when importing and exporting goods , if the consignors and consignees falsify conditions of the property rights of the goods , evade supervision of Customs , and smuggle goods that violate rights , Customs will handle them in accordance with the relevant regulations .
/other 	/person	some stipulations	The announcement also made some stipulations about the rights , responsibilities and obligations of the owners of intellectual property rights .
/other /other/legal 	/person	legal proof	The announcement clearly pointed out that goods violating intellectual property rights , including exclusive rights of trademarks , copyrights and patent rights , were not allowed to be imported or exported ; when Customs discovers the import and export of goods that are reported as violating rights and other goods that were suspected of violating intellectual property rights , it has the right to ask the people importing and exporting the goods to provide legal proof of use of related intellectual property rights and make additional reports to Customs about the state of the intellectual property rights of goods .
/other /other/legal 	/other	related materials sufficient to prove their rights	Based on rights certificates of the intellectual property rights ( for example certificates of registration of intellectual property rights or samples of the works that are copyrighted and related materials sufficient to prove their rights ) , they can report to Custom locations where the relevant goods are imported or exported and also request Customs to investigate and deal with the import and export of goods that violate .
/other 	/person /other	the appraisal and investigation	Owners of intellectual property rights , when requesting Customs to investigate and deal with goods that violate rights , should bear responsibility for reporting , assist Customs to develop investigation work and pay the appraisal and investigation of the related goods and other related expenses .

/person 	/person	The owners of intellectual property rights	The owners of intellectual property rights who are protected by China 's law can report to local Customs when they discover that goods that violate their rights are going to be imported or exported .

/other /other/product 	/person	goods that violate rights	Customs is entitled to reject shipments of goods that can not provide legal proof ; for importing and exporting laser discs , laser video discs and importing laser disc molds and materials and laser videos as part of processing trade , the consignors and consignees shall complete Customs formalities based on relevant regulations of the country and proof of approval issued by relevant departments concerned with audio and video products ; when importing and exporting goods , if the consignors and consignees falsify conditions of the property rights of the goods , evade supervision of Customs , and smuggle goods that violate rights , Customs will handle them in accordance with the relevant regulations .
/other /other/product 	/person	other goods that were suspected of violating intellectual property rights	The announcement clearly pointed out that goods violating intellectual property rights , including exclusive rights of trademarks , copyrights and patent rights , were not allowed to be imported or exported ; when Customs discovers the import and export of goods that are reported as violating rights and other goods that were suspected of violating intellectual property rights , it has the right to ask the people importing and exporting the goods to provide legal proof of use of related intellectual property rights and make additional reports to Customs about the state of the intellectual property rights of goods .
/other /other/legal 	/other	intellectual property rights	The announcement also made some stipulations about the rights , responsibilities and obligations of the owners of intellectual property rights .

/location 	/person	The Ningbo Bonded Area , which occupies a total area of 2.3 square kilometers	The Ningbo Bonded Area , which occupies a total area of 2.3 square kilometers , has made substantial achievements after 3 years of construction .
/location 	/location	The Ningbo Bonded Area	The Ningbo Bonded Area is one of the 13 bonded areas in China and was established after approval by the State Council in 1992 .
/location 	/other	the bonded area	At present , the various functions of the bonded area have fundamentally taken shaped , and its development level is high among all the bonded areas in China .
/location 	/other	the Ningbo Bonded Area	According to statistics , by the end of last year , import and export trade of the Ningbo Bonded Area added up to 812 million US dollars .
/location 	/other	the bonded area	In the last year alone , import and export trade amounts going through customs of the bonded area reached 365 million US dollars .
/location 	/location	the area	At present , there are 10 bonded warehouses in the area , the storage area of which is more than 80,000 square meters .
/location 	/other	the area	In the last year alone , the value of goods stored in the area reached 2.627 billion yuan RMB .
